definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: consider, purpose, devise (Aram. [[זְמַם]] in der. conjj.; cf. Ar. zam=a speak, talk (rare); Aram. zam is sonuit, resonavit, the n. zmomo0 is tinnitus, strepitus)—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[זׇמַם]] De 19:19 + 2 t.; [[זׇמָָם]] La 2:17; [[זׇֽמְמָה]] Pr 31:16; [[זַמּ֫וֹתָ]] Pr 30:32; [[זַמּׂ֫תִי]] Je 4:28 but also [[זׇמַ֫מְתִּי]] Zec 8:14, Zec 8:15; [[זַמּׂתִי]] Ps 17:3 either belongs here with irreg. accent (v. De), or is Inf. after anal. of [[ה]]“[[ל]] e.g. [[חַנּוֹת]] cf. Ps 77:10 (Hi Ri); Che:crit. n. rds. [[זִמָּתִי]]; [[זׇמָָמוּ]] Ps 31:14; Impf. [[יׇֽזְמוּ]] Ge 11:6 (Ges:§ 67, R. 11); on poss. Inf. [[זמּׂתִ֫י]] Ps 17:3 v. supr.; Pt. [[זׁמֵם]] Ps 37:12; —
consider, fix thought upon, c. acc. of concrete obj. [[שָׂדֶה]] Pr 31:16.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: esp. of Yahweh's purpose in punishment Je 4:28 (abs.), Je 51:12 sq. [[עשׂה]] + acc. (‖[[מְזִמָּה]]), La 2:17 (sq. [[אשׁר]]) Zec 1:6 (c. [[כאשׁר]] sq. inf.), Zec 8:14 (id.); of blessing only [[כֵּן שַׁבְתִּי]] [[זׇמַמְתִּי לְהֵיטִיב]] Zec 8:15 (opp. v:Zec 8:14).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of evil purpose of wicked men [[לעשׂות]] ´[[אשׁר יז]] Ge 11:6, De 19:19 (c. [[כאשׁר]] + inf.), Ps 31:14 (sq. inf.); abs. Pr 30:32 (‖[[נבל]]), Ps 17:3 have I (i.e. if I have) devised evil (so De); sq. [[לְ]] pers. (= against) Ps 37:12.
